description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, it supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, TIFF and MTIFF. More formats will be introduced in future. XtremeDocumentStudio includes multi-format document viewer controls for WinForms, WebForms, MVC, WPF, and HTML5. It can also convert document from one format to another, such as DOCX-to-PDF or PDF to images without requiring any other external software or libraries. It can also intelligently reconstruct page elements when converting PDF to DOCX. Some features such as programmatic document-creation, document-editing, and mail-merge have been introduced as a preview or beta.

XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.
releaseNotes:
Version 2016 R4 - May 30, 2016
==============================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Interactive form filling
    * Support for “Required” and “ReadOnly” properties
    * Support for “NoExport” property
    * Support for tooltips
    * Text Box
      + Support for “MaxLength” property
    * ListBox and ComboBox
      + Support for selection of multiple items
    * Radio Button
      + Support for “NoToggleToOff” property
  - Introduced “viewSettings” under “Preferences” to initialize viewer with default settings when a document is loaded.
    * Supported settings
      + Zoom 
      + Rotation 
      + Color inversion
  - Introduced uploadDocumentFromUri(documentUri: string) API to view document from URL.
  - Introduced rotatePages(rotationAngle: RotationAngle) API to rotate the pages to any of the pre-defined angles
  - zoom(zoomMode: ZoomMode) API now accepts zoomMode parameter. This helps in specifying auto-calculated zoom levels like “fit-width” and “fit-height”.
+ WinForms / WPF Document Viewer / Printer / Converter 
  - Removed dependency on “Newtonsoft.Json.dll”
+ Multi-Format Document Viewers / Printer / Converter 
  - PDF Viewing and Printing
    * Introduced support for rendering “JPEG2000” images 
    * Rendering of tiling graphics pattern for filling shapes.
  - Removed dependency on “log4net.dll”

Fixed
~~~~~
+ TIFF format recognition issues when extension is set to “G3F, G3N, G4F, G4N” 
+ HTML5 Document Viewer
  - Push Button with transparent background color
  - Push Button with transparent border color
+ WPF Document Viewer
  - Retaining previous rotation angle when new document is loaded
  - Events do not unregister automatically after calling CloseDocument()
  - Sender in commands is null
  - In MVVM apps, Zoom percent changes to 0.5 on on setting ZoomMode to FitHeight resulting in the viewer showing very small pages.
+ DOC Binary Format
  - Issue while constructing 0Table stream
+ PDF Viewing and Printing
  * Page contents are not rendered at the correct location following a BeginText and EndText operation if it contains a text transformation.
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides ASP .NET viewer, WinForms viewer, MVC viewer and WPF viewer components.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Ultimate
